is proving to be one of the highest-demand vehicles to be launched in recent years, and the skyrocketing resale values are proof of that. If you don't feel like paying six-figure prices to get your hands on a new C8, all you have to do is make a donation to the

*Actual Corvette may vary from images based on availability.*
C8 Corvette Stingray being given away

may vary from the car shown in these pictures, it will look very similar including the Elkhart Lake Blue Metallic paint job and staggered (19-inch front, 20-inch rear) five-spoke Carbon Flash-painted aluminum wheels wrapped with sticky Michelin Pilot Sport 4S rubber. The exterior is finished off with a high-wing Carbon Flash rear spoiler and an exposed carbon fiber ground effects kit, while the interior features black leather with GT2 bucket seats and carbon fiber trim.

The Z51 is powered by a 6.2-liter LT2 V8 engine cranking out 495 horsepower and 470 lb-ft of torque allowing this Corvette to rocket from 0-60 mph in just 2.9 seconds. As if this mid-mounted engine didn't look good enough framed by the rear window, this car also adds the Engine Appearance Package. The Z51 Package gives this aggressive Corvette a sportier suspension tune, large Brembo brakes, an electronic limited-slip differential, sport exhaust and more.
You can win this amazing car by donating to an equally amazing cause. The

helps support families whose children are receiving treatment at a local hospital. All it takes is a small donation to the Ronald McDonald House to be entered into the drawing for this 2020 Chevrolet Corvette Stingray Z51.
This giveaway will end on November 20, 2020 at 5 p.m. PST,
